revision.text:
'''Kanto''' is the first [[region]] in the Pokéclicker world, where the player starts the game. The Pokédex for this region contains 151 Pokémon from Bulbasaur to Mew. Uniquely to this region, certain Pokémon can only be found in the [[Safari Zone]]. [[File:Pokeclickerkanto.png|thumb|A Town Map of the Kanto region]] ===List of Kanto locations=== ====Towns and [[Shops]]==== {| class="wikitable" |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Pallet Town]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Pewter City]] ||[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cerulean City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Vermilion City]] |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cerladon City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Fuschia City]] ||[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Lavender Town]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Saffron City]] |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cinnabar Island]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Viridian City]] ||[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Indigo Plateau Kanto]] |} ====Routes==== ''See [[Route Statistics]] for more in-depth info.'' '''Kanto''' is the first [[region]] in the Pokéclicker world, where the player starts the game. The Pokédex for this region contains 151 Pokémon from Bulbasaur to Mew. Uniquely to this region, certain Pokémon can only be found in the [[Safari Zone]]. [[File:Pokeclickerkanto.png|thumb|A Town Map of the Kanto region]] ===List of Kanto locations=== ====Towns and [[Shops]]==== {| class="wikitable" |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Pallet Town]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Pewter City]] ||[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cerulean City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Vermilion City]] |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cerladon City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Fuschia City]] ||[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Lavender Town]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Saffron City]] |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cinnabar Island]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Viridian City]] ||[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Indigo Plateau Kanto]] |} ====Routes==== ''See [[Route Statistics]] for more in-depth info.'' '''Kanto''' is the first [[region]] in the Pokéclicker world, where the player starts the game. The Pokédex for this region contains 151 Pokémon from Bulbasaur to Mew. Uniquely to this region, certain Pokémon can only be found in the [[Safari Zone]]. [[File:Pokeclickerkanto.png|thumb|A Town Map of the Kanto region]] ===List of Kanto locations=== ====Towns and [[Shops]]==== {| class="wikitable" |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Pallet Town]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Pewter City]] ||[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cerulean City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Vermilion City]] |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cerladon City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Fuschia City]] ||[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Lavender Town]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Saffron City]] |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cinnabar Island]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Viridian City]] ||[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Indigo Plateau Kanto]] |} ====Routes==== ''See [[Route Statistics]] for more in-depth info.'' '''Kanto''' is the first [[region]] in the Pokéclicker world, where the player starts the game. The Pokédex for this region contains 151 Pokémon from Bulbasaur to Mew. Uniquely to this region, certain Pokémon can only be found in the [[Safari Zone]]. [[File:Pokeclickerkanto.png|thumb|A Town Map of the Kanto region]] ===List of Kanto locations=== ====Towns and [[Shops]]==== {| class="wikitable" |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Pallet Town]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Pewter City]] ||[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cerulean City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Vermilion City]] |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cerladon City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Fuschia City]] ||[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Lavender Town]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Saffron City]] |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cinnabar Island]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Viridian City]] ||[[Towns_%26_Cities#Kanto_Cities_.26_Towns|Indigo Plateau Kanto]] |} ====Routes==== ''See [[Route Statistics]] for more in-depth info.''
